snippet: By connecting female college students with accomplished women working in science and technology fields, a new program hopes to increase the number going into these fields.
abstract: Program Women in Technology Sharing Online, or WitsOn, is enlisting hundreds of prominent women working in science, technology, engineering and math to become online mentors for college students, in order to encourage young women to take interest in those fields.
lead_paragraph: By connecting female college students with accomplished women working in science and technology fields, a new program hopes to increase the number going into these fields.

headline.seo: Online Mentoring Program to Encourage Women in Sciences
headline.main: Online Mentors to Guide Women Into the Sciences
headline.print_headline: Online Mentors to Guide Women Into the Sciences
